casebody.head_matter:
401 A.2d 364
PROVIDENT NATIONAL BANK, Appellee v. Eli RAITPORT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 16, 1979.
Decided May 21, 1979.
Eli Raitport, Philadelphia, in pro per.
James W. Tracey, III, Wollman, Tracey & Schlesinger, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
